title: OMG pbe notes maybe they nerfed lee

replies.body:
I think you misspelled "Sona." Lee Sin got nerfed, like, 16 times last seaâ€”Oh, wait...

I must've mixed them up! XD
Um lee sin has been nerfed SEVERAL times throughout the seasons. Even the pros don't play him much in the LCS anymore. Can't believe the butthurt GD sheep still cry about him.

> [{quoted}](name=Mo9999,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uAt8kOut,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-02T23:58:26.138+0000)
>
> Um lee sin has been nerfed SEVERAL times throughout the seasons. Even the pros don't play him much in the LCS anymore. Can't believe the butthurt GD sheep still cry about him.

Yo this was one of the things that shocked me most when moving from EU to NA boards, all the Lee Sin complaints.
He did get nerfed a few times, lol, look at his patch history.

> [{quoted}](name=MCBiggah99,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uAt8kOut,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-03-03T00:03:59.765+0000)
>
> Yo this was one of the things that shocked me most when moving from EU to NA boards, all the Lee Sin complaints.
> He did get nerfed a few times, lol, look at his patch history.

and then they reverted them because lee mains cried too much about them and Riot sees lee with dollar signs. Meanwhile there's a huge demand to revert the Veigar changes and they aren't listening because he hurts their LC$ mobility agenda. Only reason Lee wasn't picked #1 jungler competitively is because Jarvan was atrociously safe with more reliable ganks.

1) he hurt their LC$ mobility agenda
2) LC$BIGPLAYZ ultra mobile Kassadin gutted in the same patch

What?

Kass ain't flashy like Lee 

Going Faker or InSec with kass just isn't possible 

Thus he got gutted
XPeke anyone?
Kasssadins biggest high light was flying over a base. Doesn't sound to exciting to me.
you just proved lee sin is not op lmao
no they didn't
Are you stupid?
Yeah so many sad threads about Lee sin when he's hardly even seen.
Even Lee Sin doesn't see Lee Sin
ikr!

He's seen very normally especially after changes have been made in any area of the game. He's the go to jungler who has  the best overall stats.

Not to mention that he can play every role. Even when he was released Riot even leveled with the fans at the time baiscally saying 

"We know this is kind of bullshit but it's because he's a ground zero champion."

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h2XB2iIecXI
I've seen him once in the past 30 games I've played... so no, he's really not the "go to jungler"

Lets judge the entire basis of a single champion on one persons expediencies with them. That'll give us that revenue. 

But yeah he is the go to jungler. If you're in low elo he's just another champion but gold3+ he's the standard. Like I said, if there is every a change to jsut about anything in the game Lee Sin has a spike in play mainly because he is the standard. 

Riot is even modeling the jungle and future junglers after Lee Sin's ability. I don't have a grip about having standards, that's something i actually prefer but my problem with Lee Sin is how much DPS he has and how people think their gods just like ward hoping.

IMO Lee Sin is without a doubt one of the funniest champions to play. His damage is just to high for someone who is so mobile and such few weaknesses.

Funny coming from someone in bronze.

Besides there's been several others in here that already agree with me on it, that he's not a problem.  Riot is also NOT basing future champions off of him, lololol, where do you get this non-sense.

I got into Bronze last year because it was my first and I insta bought 16 champions and rushed into ranked with no real skill.  I stopped playing ranked shortly after. Not until the end of season did I start playing again because a friend wanted to climb up.

We got our team into Gold 4 and I helped get his Solo Q from Bronze 3 to silver. Hell I even got high silver on the PBE when Riot wanted to test the ranked systems and when they didn't need us to test it anymore i stopped playing.

I had realized that the higher you climb the less fun the game becomes because you can only use certain run of the mill champs.

Yeah you have 2 that agree with you but a hundred that disagree.
 Your point must be so relevant is so many seem to dislike it.

btw read a redpost every now and again,you'll learn alot.

Yawn. Oh you're still talking?

"run of the mill" lol. you really do know nothing about the game if you think that.

I read red posts all the time.

Just keep crying over a champ they aren't going to chance cause he's really not a problem if you knew how to play.

Everyone one on the side of nerfing Lee Sin are right but only in some aspects. Since you clearly have nothing more to say. Obviously you can't counter ague any of the points I've made so I'll just take the win and leave get out of your hair.

No, they aren't right in all aspects or else Riot would have actually addressed these "problems" by now. So take your lose and leave since you are the only one here that still cared :)  Plus you didn't show anything yourself that backs up why you think he's a problem.

I've showed that he doesn't show up in most games in any mode, aside from the fact that his "popularity" is at 24% which is honestly not even that high. If a champ had something more towards 50% or so I'd be concerned, but a low 20s is not an issue at all.
start doing ranked again and you will see him very often.
That's funny you say that, cause I just checked your history and I saw him in 1 of the 9 ranked games you played... so...
thats cause hes banned 8 of the 9 ranked games? OP
25% pick rate... in all games.

> [{quoted}](name=Mo9999,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uAt8kOut,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-02T23:58:26.138+0000)
>
> Um lee sin has been nerfed SEVERAL times throughout the seasons. Even the pros don't play him much in the LCS anymore. Can't believe the butthurt GD sheep still cry about him.

ikr? its becoming a joke at this point. This is the only place where people are still bitching about lee, everyone else has moved on.  Its old as fuck

This has got to be the biggest circlejerk in this game s history

> [{quoted}](name=pleep,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uAt8kOut,comment-id=00020004,timestamp=2015-03-03T04:31:50.238+0000)
>
> ikr? its becoming a joke at this point. This is the only place where people are still bitching about lee, everyone else has moved on.  Its old as fuck
> 
> This has got to be the biggest circlejerk in this game s history

Just because cancer is in early stages of remission doesn't make it not cancer, nor does it prevent it from getting worse again
I figured it was just a meme, people actually don't care about lee it has just turned into a saying of sorts.

> [{quoted}](name=Mo9999,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uAt8kOut,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-03-02T23:58:26.138+0000)
>
> Um lee sin has been nerfed SEVERAL times throughout the seasons. Even the pros don't play him much in the LCS anymore. Can't believe the butthurt GD sheep still cry about him.

He didn't get much play because a couple other junglers managed to be more OP than him, which Riot couldn't have, so they "fixed" that.  The only broken madness jungler allowed is the Sin.
Obvious Lee Sin main confirmed. ^

inb4 two weeks before world's arrives and morello shows up to say "oh yeah we were definitely going to add meaningful counterplay and weaknesses to lee but it's too close to worlds and we don't want to upset the balance"

> [{quoted}](name=Quepha,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uAt8kOut,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2015-03-03T04:41:27.602+0000)
>
> inb4 two weeks before world's arrives and morello shows up to say "oh yeah we were definitely going to add meaningful counterplay and weaknesses to lee but it's too close to worlds and we don't want to upset the balance"

Sure this was at same time at the Skarner rework.

Skarner dump on lee sin hard then was nerf fast after that.

I could see {{champion:64}} getting nerfed...

Right after {{champion:421}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:254}} &{{champion:107}} all get nerfed and {{champion:64}} is again at the top and ban worthy.

Just downvote this post, it is literally just "Lee ain't getting nerf :( "

We got it, you hate lee and want him nerfed, now shut up.

> [{quoted}](name=Silents429,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uAt8kOut,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-03-03T18:02:16.147+0000)
>
> Just downvote this post, it is literally just "Lee ain't getting nerf :( "
> 
> We got it, you hate lee and want him nerfed, now shut up.

are you really that afraid to post on your main account? Or will we see a match history of a Lee main LOL

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Macaroni,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=uAt8kOut,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2015-03-03T22:22:18.826+0000)
>
> are you really that afraid to post on your main account? Or will we see a match history of a Lee main LOL

This is my main? And whether I play Lee or not doesn't change anything.
Is already time for this circlejerk thread again?
It's ok Lee Sin is getting nerfed in s4
